title: The Sun Compared to Other Stars
description: A fast breakdown of The Sun Compared to Other Stars for builders.

hook.text: We call the Sun a star, but compared to others, it's surprisingly average.

buildup.text: The largest known star, UY Scuti, could fit 5 billion Suns inside it.

discovery.text: But most stars in the galaxy are red dwarfs â€” far smaller and cooler than ours.

twist.text: Those dim red dwarfs burn so slowly they can last over a trillion years.

climax.text: Our Sun will die in 10 billion years total. Red dwarfs will outlive everything.

punchline.text: The Sun is average. That's exactly why life had time to evolve.
